verbs.description: Film director Spike Lee [V: has] lashed out at President Donald Trump calling him a ' mother f***er ' during an expletive - ridden rant at the Cannes Film Festival on Tuesday .

[ARG0: Film director Spike Lee] has [V: lashed] out [ARG1: at President Donald Trump calling him a ' mother f***er '] [ARGM-TMP: during an expletive - ridden rant at the Cannes Film Festival on Tuesday] .

Film director Spike Lee has lashed out at [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: calling] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: a ' mother f***er '] during an expletive - ridden rant at the Cannes Film Festival on Tuesday .
